description:
A new http://anidb.net/ch57680 [Build Strike] created by http://anidb.net/ch57667 [Iori Sei], based on an Entry Grade http://anidb.net/ch1577 [Strike Gundam]. It uses an energy super-light circulation mechanism called the "EG (Energy Glitter-circulation) System," based on the RG System, which is capable of multidimensional boost-ups to suit the battle situation.
Source: Official page
name: Build Strike Exceed Galaxy
